title: Embodied Learning in Tourism Education: Sensory Understanding Through Urban Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational tourism education theory and basic understanding of instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Targets pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on field-linked learning activities using smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners collect and interpret sensory data while exploring specific tourist locations through experiential walking methods
Design three teachable strategies applicable to tourism education settings based on embodied learning experiences
Learners incorporate reflective insights from field exploration into final project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
